modName: Chillrend Glass Dagger with Silver or Gold handle
summary: Replaces your Glass Dagger texture, so that the dagger has a more blue-ish blade, like the the Chillrend. Gold version keeps the original handle color, the Silver version makes the handle of the dagger silver.
descriptionHtml:
Do you think the Glass Dagger has a too greenish tone to it? Do you want it to be more blue, like the Chillrend? If so, this is the mod for you.

Replaces your Glass Dagger texture, so that the dagger has a more blue-ish blade, like the the Chillrend. Gold version keeps the original handle color, the Silver version makes the handle of the dagger silver.

Installation instructions included in the archive, open the archive using winRAR.
author: Rafalema
